author: barnabemonnot
content:
hi! trying to catch up on all the transaction pool proposals. am I correct to understand that the current approach has the following properties?
- Lowest fee cap transactions are evicted first
- Highest effective priority fee transactions are included first
- Transactions are replaced only when both fee cap and priority fee are bumped by a sufficient amount

author: trent_vanepps
content: if chosen, i imagine the % "bumped by a sufficient amount" will be important to surface to end users via wallet interfaces
